title: Godzilla
occurrences: Do they believe that this Godzilla is responsible for the recent ship disasters?
The natives of the island knew, though. They said it was Godzilla...
It is my belief that Godzilla was forced out of hiding...
The military is launching a depth bomb attack on Godzilla this afternoon.
They are such fools... Godzilla's destruction is not the answer...
...and the destruction of Godzilla to reach the streets.
Godzilla was still in the bay...
Yes. They think they've come up with a way to stop Godzilla!
Should Godzilla attack, he'd have to break through 300,000 volts of electricity...
The gigantic monster the Japanese call Godzilla has just emerged from the bay...
Godzilla has turned the heart of Tokyo...
Unless? - I was shown something that may be the only way to destroy Godzilla...
They both agree that we must use it to stop Godzilla...
If we don't defend ourselves now... against Godzilla... then what will become of us?
Then you a great responsibility, doctor... To decide between your own fear and Godzilla...
The location of Godzilla had been found...
